info.title: Reference
info.description: The 3taps Reference API provides information about the data sources, categories and locations available within the 3taps system. This information can be used by external systems to do things such as displaying a pick-list of available categories, translating location codes into location names, etc.

get.description: To obtain a list of categories
To obtain a list of category groups
To obtain a list of data sources

parameters.name: auto_token
parameters.description: This will eventually be the authentication token used to authenticate the caller. Note that this is currently ignored.

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: The 3taps location code for the desired location.

get.description: To obtain a list of locations

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: Only include locations that are completely or partly within the given city. The parameter's value must be a valid 3taps city code.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Only include locations that are completely or partly within the given country. The parameter's value must be a valid 3taps country code.

parameters.name: county
parameters.description: Only include locations that are completely or partly within the given county. The parameter's value must be a valid 3taps county code.

parameters.name: level
parameters.description: The desired location level.  The following location levels are currently supported: country, state, metro, region, county, city, locality, zipcode

parameters.name: locality
parameters.description: Only include locations that are completely or partly within the given locality. The parameter's value must be a valid 3taps locality code.

parameters.name: max_lat
parameters.description: If these parameters are supplied, only locations which are completely or partially enclosed by the given lat/long bounding box will be returned

parameters.name: max_long
parameters.description: If these parameters are supplied, only locations which are completely or partially enclosed by the given lat/long bounding box will be returned

parameters.name: metro
parameters.description: Only include locations that are completely or partly within the given metro area. The parameter's value must be a valid 3taps metro area code.

parameters.name: min_lat
parameters.description: If these parameters are supplied, only locations which are completely or partially enclosed by the given lat/long bounding box will be returned

parameters.name: min_long
parameters.description: If these parameters are supplied, only locations which are completely or partially enclosed by the given lat/long bounding box will be returned

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: Only include locations that are completely or partly within the given region. The parameter's value must be a valid 3taps region code.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Only include locations that are completely or partly within the given state. The parameter's value must be a valid 3taps state code.
